title: Retention Strategies are Key for Subscription Business Survival
summary: This article discusses the importance of customer retention for subscription businesses, drawing an analogy to WWII survival deviation. It emphasizes focusing on retaining existing customers through incremental improvements rather than solely on acquiring new ones to ensure long-term business survival.
key_points: Customer retention is crucial for subscription business survival.
Focus on incremental improvements in retention to achieve compounding impacts.
Avoid survival deviation by learning from failures (churned customers) as well as successes.
Rising customer acquisition costs make retention even more critical.
